command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/d/5/6/dataset_d5684cf1-ded0-4642-9fef-71099246e544.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&            bcftools view         --exclude-types "snps"  --drop-genotypes                   --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/2/d/3/dataset_2d343933-c7d5-4e7f-993e-05b136cb74b4.dat'
